ValidationRule.description: Parent Ticket (NOC) cannot be assigned to a queue other than Global NOC until Service is Restored
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), Service_Restored__c = False, RecordType.Name = "PGi-Parent Ticket (NOC)", OwnerId <> $User.Id, ISCHANGED(OwnerId), Owner:Queue.Id <> "00G1B000004VDNy")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Parent Ticket NOC must remain with Global NOC queue until Service has been Restored.
